content: 4 now you need to sew both octopus halves together make sure that the ugly sides of the octopuses face each other so that all the ugly loose strands of yarn are hidden and the face looks right at you when you look at it from underneath make sure to stuff the tentacles well i also stuffed the body a bit but that s optional 5 alternatively you can first sew on all the color b tentacles to the already attached color a tentacles and then sew on the color b body either way stuff your new octopus friend well and make sure the ugly sides of both octopuses face each other 6 make sure that all the loose yarn is hidden away inside of the octopus and that all the seams look clean now you should have a brand new reversible mood octopus i hope you liked this pattern by crochetingdummy
